alert.note: Alert for Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Randolph and southwestern Chatham Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Siler City, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Siler City, Ramseur, Staley, Harpers Crossroads, Coleridge and Hasty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
